sn29.6:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn29.6:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena m’idhekacce opapatika naga uposatham upavasanti vossatthakaya ca bhavanti”ti?
sn29.6:2.1: “Idha, bhikkhu, ekaccanam opapatikanam naganam evam hoti:
sn29.6:2.2: ‘mayam kho pubbe kayena dvayakarino ahumha, vacaya dvayakarino, manasa dvayakarino.
sn29.6:2.3: Te mayam kayena dvayakarino, vacaya dvayakarino, manasa dvayakarino, kayassa bheda param marana opapatikanam naganam sahabyatam upapanna.
sn29.6:2.4: Sacajja mayam kayena sucaritam careyyama, vacaya … manasa sucaritam careyyama, evam mayam kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjeyyama.
sn29.6:2.5: Handa mayam etarahi kayena sucaritam carama, vacaya … manasa sucaritam carama’ti.
sn29.6:2.6: Ayam kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayam paccayo, yena m’idhekacce opapatika naga uposatham upavasanti vossatthakaya ca bhavanti”ti.
